reviewText: This DVD is about 30 minutes in length, and is more of a commercial or promo for the book--while the interview with 2 of PY's disciples is an obvious hit--it is short and for the price, could've be at least full length--it would've been great if this expounded on the teachings in the book, or presented them, but it's just a couple blinks about PY writing it. My suggestion would be to skip this and go for one that has teachings.
Curtis explains why we are exercising the way he shows us...warm up, cardio, weights, etc. keeps us going!!!
Difficult to watch because the audio is not sync with video. Exercise good.
Good program.  Would help to demo each exercise in slo-mo before doing it.
I bought this for my 80 year old mother and she absolutely loves it!

This DVD is different from the other "older adult" DVDs I own.  It seems more rigorous, which makes for a nice change (I switch up the DVDs every day).  The exercises move quickly, so your heart is pumping, but not so much that you can't keep up.  At least, it's that way for me.
Curtis is pleasant, but he repeats everything he says several times.  No matter, I still like using this DVD.
loved it! added some punch to the regular yoga classes.
I love that it is seated and still gives you a great wor4kout!

It is about a Master who experience the Christ within..
I experience it very uplifting - the same message comes to light:
"If I can do, you can too.."
Just be Love and Light, because you are..
